column4: How do I install gnome-app-installer in Lucid? It's not in the repos anymore :(
The one that used to be before it was replaced by software center in 9.10.
don't know why you'd want to but perhaps http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1466292 will help.  Good luck, guess there is a PPA that includes it.
I find it easier to use to get software than synaptic and software center doesn't seem to include all apps available in the repos.
